overview: We don't expect you to believe your eyes when you see this one! Fucking Betty drinks the piss and sperm from 60 cocks, and barely pauses to take a breath. This crazy freak actually collects it on plates, pours it in glasses, mixes it into cocktail concoctions and drinks it all down. Good to the last drop? Betty would say, "Yes," but her mouth is full!
title: Betty, Queen of Piss and Sperm
